title: Another infested game.
body:
When will Riot put a stop to the Levelbots in ARAM.
Please, for the love of god don't turn into blizzard entertainment and let the carefactor go out the window for more $$$$$

Put some love back into this already.

NAME AND SHAME:

replies.body: I hope aside from removing the names Riot actually did something about the accounts

probs not, i have a notepad with about 400 bot names and riot are too fucking useless to do anything about it.

Typical game company, once they start making $$$ they dont give a shit anymore.
Yeah worst thing is, it would be so easy to fix.
